name: Compaction Action
description:
Trash falls down from the top of the screen, and your job is to collect it, compact it and sort it. Chow down on some junk and clean the world before it overwhelms you!

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Space to jump
  • C to eat and compact various junk
  • V to throw trash ala Yoshi's Island
  • B to "poop" trash under you, placing it and elevating yourself in the process

If trash fills up the screen, you lose. The point is to obtain a high score, but they are not saved in any way by the game. You can walk through blocks, and they only stop you from falling. You can pass through blocks by holding down and pressing jump.

Credits:

  • ProgramGamer: Programming
  • Jessica: Art and UI
  • Michael: Music and SFX
